    public class ToggleColourButton
extends FastButton
implements PressHandler
    Button that can be used to change the drawing colour.
    Author:
    Group Fingerpaint

      • update

        protected void update(int updateWhat)
        Set the background colour properties for the foreground and background elements (using the global fgCol and bgCol).
        Parameters:
        updateWhat - A constant to indicate if only the foreground colour, only the background colour or both should be updated.
